0010100110011101 1000111001110110 1 -> sum: 1011100000010100, cout: 0
1000101100110100 1000011000000011 0 -> sum: 0001000100110111, cout: 1
0011101111110011 0101110010110010 1 -> sum: 1001100010100110, cout: 0
0001000010011101 0100111111101100 1 -> sum: 0110000010001010, cout: 0
1001100101110101 0000010000110010 0 -> sum: 1001110110100111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
